text: Edward Díaz (born 19 August 1994) is a Colombian professional racing cyclist riding for . ==Doping== On 28 November 2017 news broke that Díaz had tested positive for CERA at the 2017 Vuelta a Colombia. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Colombian male cyclists Category:People from Nobsa
title: Edward Díaz
